subject: World Baseball Classic
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Johnny Damon went 1 for 3 with a walk, but his Thailand team was defeated by the Philippines, 8-2, in a qualifier for the World Baseball Classic in Taiwan.
snippet: Johnny Damon went 1 for 3 with a walk, but his Thailand team was defeated by the Philippines, 8-2, in a qualifier for the World Baseball Classic in Taiwan.
